metadata.description: Skills for building terminal UIs with Bubbletea and the Charm ecosystem

plugins.name: charm-dev
plugins.description: Build terminal UIs using Bubbletea and the Charm ecosystem (Lipgloss, Huh, Gum). Comprehensive skill with 47 Bubbletea examples, architecture guides (ELM/TEA, MVC, components), styling examples, and interactive form patterns.
